sen.j: 茶櫃（ちゃびつ、あるいはちゃひつ）は煎茶道具一式を入れて置く蓋付きの容器。
sen.e: Chabitsu (also called chahitsu, "茶櫃" in Chinese characters) is a container with a lid, in which a set of Sencha (non-powdered green tea) tea utensils is put.
Chabitsu (also called chahitsu, "茶櫃" in Chinese characters) is a lidded container, in which a set of Sencha (non-powdered green tea) tea utensils is stored.

sen.j: 形状は高さの低い円筒形。
sen.e: It has low, cylindrical shape.

sen.j: 蓋は盆としても使用できる。
sen.e: The lid can also be used as a tray.

sen.j: 本来「櫃」は蓋付きの大きな木箱一般を指す。
sen.e: The Chinese character '櫃' originally indicates a big wooden box with a lid.

sen.j: かつては家庭に一台はあった。
sen.e: Every household used to have one or more chabitsu.
